name: ClipClip
description:
For a better experience, download and play the windows version. Also, wear your headphone. Description:

This is my first game jam game. It's an atmosphere game but not horror, no jumpscare. The game will end with a short animation clip, so if you haven't seen it yet, the game is not finished. I predict that the game might be a little bit hard when it comes to the 3rd or 4th stages, but I still strongly recommend you guys to play through the whole game even if you really suffer.

Instruction:

For the one who DONT KNOW HOW TO PASS THE INTRO:

  1. You can get paper from the tray by jumping and clipping the paper with either LMB/RMB. You can still move while clipping papers.
  2. Roughly align three papers with the same words and hit the LMB to merge them
  3. Jump is not strictly restricted so hitting space fast grants you strong momentum
Controls:
  • Mouse: 
    • left key: hold multiple paper/merge papers
    • right key: hold one paper
  • WSAD: movement control
  • Space: jump
Attributes:
  • Audio: Sound from Zapsplat.com
